about_the_game:
You were a simple detective, but after a weird dream, you got a contract for one million dollars to find info on the Daemon-Lance corporation. After things went south, you were left for dead to come back as an Aswang. With your new demonic powers, you must solve the case and undercover the mystery!

  • Uncover the mystery by uncovering clues!

  • Talk to other demons, friend or foe, for secrets and info about your cause!

  • Recruit other demons to join your party!

  • Use the TP charge system to charge your attacks and the shield system to attack weaknesses to destroy all enemy defenses in this fast-paced RPG!

  • Collect all the 72 secret tarot cards hidden around for a big secret!

  • Explore the 7 main dungeons for info about the case and fight big demons along the way!

  • Choose your actions carefully in the many side quests!

  • There are three main story routes each taking 10–15 hours each!

The path to the truth is clouded by mystery and danger. Are you up to the task?

content_descriptors.notes: The story is mature covering themes like homelessness, political corruption and more. Some allies/enemies are partially nude.

detailed_description:
You were a simple detective, but after a weird dream, you got a contract for one million dollars to find info on the Daemon-Lance corporation. After things went south, you were left for dead to come back as an Aswang. With your new demonic powers, you must solve the case and undercover the mystery!

  • Recruit other demons to join your party!

  • Collect all the 72 secret tarot cards hidden around for a big secret!

  • Explore the 7 main dungeons for info about the case and fight big demons along the way!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: i3-2130
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GT-1030
  • Storage: 630 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Some areas might me laggy on older hardware to load up
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 3 3400g
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon™ RX Vega 11
  • Storage: 630 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any

short_description: You are a detective being hunted by others. Gather allies. Survive against your foes to get stronger and to gather more clues. Explore and do the plentiful side quests to find the puzzle pieces you need to get a full picture. Solve the case if you want to survive.
